languages.text: {n}Пальцы друкари стискивают ваше лицо, а его голос падает до шепота.{/n} "Твоя покладистость, мо{mf|й|я} звер{mf|ек|ушка}, красит тебя. А теперь..."
{n}The Drukhari's fingers grip your face, and his voice drops to a whisper.{/n} "Your docility, my pet, becomes you. Now..."
languages.original_text: {n}Пальцы друкари стискивают ваше лицо, а его голос падает до шепота.{/n} "Твоя покладистость, мо{mf|й|я} звер{mf|ек|ушка}, красит тебя. А теперь..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari's fingers grip your face, and his voice drops to a whisper.{/n} "Your docility, my pet, becomes you. Now..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋伸出手指，捏住你的下巴，压低了声音耳语道。{/n}“乖乖听好，才是我的小宠物。现在嘛……”
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's fingers grip your face, and his voice drops to a whisper.{/n} "Your docility, my pet, becomes you. Now..."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋伸出手指，捏住你的下巴，压低了声音耳语道。{/n}“乖乖听好，才是我的小宠物。现在嘛……”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los dedos del drukhari se cierran en torno a tu cara y su voz se convierte en un susurro.{/n} «Esa docilidad, mascota mía, te favorece. Y ahora...».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's fingers grip your face, and his voice drops to a whisper.{/n} "Your docility, my pet, becomes you. Now..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los dedos del drukhari se cierran en torno a tu cara y su voz se convierte en un susurro.{/n} «Esa docilidad, mascota mía, te favorece. Y ahora...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}La main du Drukhari se referme sur votre mâchoire, et sa voix devient un murmure.{/n} « Cette docilité vous sied à ravir, {mf|mon brave petit|ma brave petite} esclave. Et maintenant... »
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's fingers grip your face, and his voice drops to a whisper.{/n} "Your docility, my pet, becomes you. Now..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La main du Drukhari se referme sur votre mâchoire, et sa voix devient un murmure.{/n} « Cette docilité vous sied à ravir, {mf|mon brave petit|ma brave petite} esclave. Et maintenant... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die Finger des Drukhari greifen dein Gesicht und seine Stimme senkt sich zu einem Flüstern.{/n} "Eure Fügsamkeit, {mf|mein Ergebener|meine Ergebene}, steht Euch gut. Jetzt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's fingers grip your face, and his voice drops to a whisper.{/n} "Your docility, my pet, becomes you. Now..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Finger des Drukhari greifen dein Gesicht und seine Stimme senkt sich zu einem Flüstern.{/n} "Eure Fügsamkeit, {mf|mein Ergebener|meine Ergebene}, steht Euch gut. Jetzt ..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}デュカーリの指があなたの顔を掴み、囁くような声音を発する。{/n}「ああ、その従順さだ、俺のペットよ。さあ…」
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's fingers grip your face, and his voice drops to a whisper.{/n} "Your docility, my pet, becomes you. Now..."

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリの指があなたの顔を掴み、囁くような声音を発する。{/n}「ああ、その従順さだ、俺のペットよ。さあ…」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Drukhari, parmaklarıyla yüzünü kavrıyor. Sesiyse bir fısıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n} "Evcil hayvanım, uysallığın sana yakışıyor. Şimdi..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's fingers grip your face, and his voice drops to a whisper.{/n} "Your docility, my pet, becomes you. Now..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari'nin parmakları yüzünü kavrıyor, sesiyse bir fısıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n} "Evcil hayvanım, uysallığın sana yakışıyor. Şimdi..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
